title: Jack Nicholson
summary: John Joseph Nicholson (born April 22, 1937) is an American actor and filmmaker whose career spanned more than 50 years.[1] He is known for having played a wide range of starring and supporting roles, including comic characters, romantic leads, anti-heroes and villains. In many of his films, he played the "eternal outsider, the sardonic drifter", someone who rebels against the social structure.[2] He is the recipient of numerous accolades, including three Academy Awards.
